definitions: a person who gives or transfers something to someone else
shortDefinitions: person who gives or transfers something to someone else

definitions: (in football, soccer, hockey, and other games) a player who throws, kicks, or hits the ball or puck to another on their side

examples.text: he is an excellent passer of the ball
one of the league's most accurate passers

shortDefinitions: (in games) player who kicks, hits, or throws ball to another on their side

definitions: a legislative or other official body that approves or puts into effect a proposal or law by voting on it
shortDefinitions: legislative or other official body that approves or puts into effect proposal or law by voting on it
